Download (Using original 0.25 compatible planetfactory and starsystems 0.2):http://www./download/xh0y1saxx05mihe/Kerbal_galactic(2).zip

UPDATED DOWNLOAD:http://www./download/umowcpixtt96ajo/Kerbal_Galactic_0.1_Updated_for_0.90.zip

I hope you guys like it my texture work is terrible but i did the best i could

Completed starsystems:

0-1 Yellow stars

1-1 Blue dwarfs (Dolas, I know i didnt make the star but the planets are all mine )

0-1 Blue Giants

1-2 Red dwarfs

0-1 Red Hypergiant!! "Literally the radius is the size of the kerbol system alone!! (Almost, Probably a bit less )"

BTW i am bad at making cloud packs, Biomes, sciencedefs, And heightmaps (The planet gerv has been hell for me in making a heightmap for it.) , Maybe you guys could make me some

Edited February 24, 2015 by daniel l.

FIRST!!! And you did an amazing job. Daniel, If it is alright with you, I would like to use this mod, as a spotlight, on my first PC video on my youtube channel? I have not done PC videos, as i am a noob on YouTube. I have like, 10 subs. XD Anyway, This pack is amazing and i would love to use this in my first PC video XD

Maybe we can do like a double commentary... I just Got the best idea but i dont wanna say it because somebody will steal it. XD

The reason sentar is jool is because you arent supposed to load sentar

Well, I did disable the Sentar expansion the first time, but nothing appeared, no new stars, no new planets, nothing but stock planetary bodies.

Then I restarted the game, and turned on the sentar expansion, and still nothing.

Its not for kopernicus...

Nope, It bugged out and removed all 4 craft from a slightly new save.

Yeah, Sentar has Jool's textures, actually, every new planet HAS the stock textures. But could not find a hypergiant, or any other star system for that matter.

Although it has great texture fr the backdrop.

As for the planets what you need to do is not have any other systems loaded, star systems can be fixed by installing a version that works then go into the config file and copy the current custom systems into the new star systems folder.

Sorry for bringing this up again, but maybe you should reconfigure the mod to work with kopernicustech, which is still working, so therefore you won't have a mod that has not been updated since 0.24 ksp.
Sorry guys. I am trying to fix things here but i cant get 0.90 working so i am forced to use older versions of the required mods making it impossible to easily make a working release
